Comment.value:
This trigger handles fire and forget fx.  It uses a target invisible placeable called target_FNF_fx.    You must place a target_FNF_fx placeable near the trigger or it won't work!  

Scroll down the list with your arrow keys - there are more than 150 fire and forget (ephemeral) effects listed here.


FX Number       Description

f18              big cloud of white sparkles
f19              blue-white magic spiral
f20              purple-blue magic spiral
f21              cloudy white starburst
f22              fireball explosion
f23              giant ring of fire
